thread.title: Beyoncé Lullaby Album Coming Soon: Listen to “Hold Up” and “Single Ladies”
thread.title_full: Beyoncé Lullaby Album Coming Soon: Listen to “Hold Up” and “Single Ladies”

author: Noah Yoo
title: Beyoncé Lullaby Album Coming Soon: Listen to “Hold Up” and “Single Ladies”
text:
Beyoncé Lullaby Album Coming Soon: Listen to “Hold Up” and “Single Ladies” Rockabye Baby’s latest release gathers hits from throughout Bey’s career Beyoncé Photo by Alo Ceballos/GC Images 
Children’s lullaby label Rockabye Baby has announced their latest release. Lullaby Renditions Of Beyoncé arrives February 24, and features lullaby versions of songs from throughout all of Beyoncé ’s career. Listen to the mellowed-out, xylophone-heavy versions of “Hold Up” (off Lemonade ) and “Single Ladies” (off I Am... Sasha Fierce ) below. Last year, Rockabye Baby celebrated their 10-year anniversary with a compilation that included LCD Soundsystem’s “All My Friends” reimagined as a lullaby. 
Revisit the video for the original version of “Hold Up”: Artists In This Story
